  • Method Details

    • setStage

      public void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage stage)

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller class. This method is automatically called by the FXMLLoader when the corresponding FXML file is loaded. It sets up the UI elements and populates the choice boxes. It also sets up event handlers for the choice boxes and populates the table with existing blank entries.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • getBlankChosen

      public void getBlankChosen(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • getCommisionChosen

      public void getCommisionChosen(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • addBlanks

      public void addBlanks()
      Adds a specified amount of blanks to the database. The starting blank ID is set to be the maximum blank ID plus one. The staff ID and sold status are set to default values. The date added is set to the current date.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error executing the SQL statement.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • setCommission

      public void setCommission()
      This method updates the commission rates for the system. Which is from GUI input

    • refreshTable

      public void refreshTable()
      This method refreshed the blanks table when a change has been made

    • getMaxBlank

      public Long getMaxBlank()
      Retrieves the maximum blank ID from the database based on the chosen blank type. Initializes the value to the starting value of the blank type if there are no existing blank IDs of that type in the database.
      Returns:
      A Long value representing the maximum blank ID.

    • populateBlankTable

      public void populateBlankTable()
      Populates the TableView with Blank objects queried from the database. Also sets up filtering and sorting for the TableView. Sets up the PropertyValueFactory for each column to map to the corresponding Blank object property. Adds a listener to the searchBlankIDTextField to filter the data in the TableView based on the entered text. Finally, sets the items of the TableView to the sorted data and assigns the selected items to the selectedBlanksList.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is an SQL exception when executing the query or when closing the database connection

    • logOut

      public void logOut() throws IOException
      Method for logging out , switches the stage to login screen
      Throws:
      IOException

    • removeBlank

      public void removeBlank() throws SQLException
      Removes a selected blank from the database and refreshes the table.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or this method is called on a closed connection

    • backupDatabase

      public void backupDatabase() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Backs up the database to src folder DB_Backup folder
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException
